Brian Finneran doesn't argue with Michael Vick 's own self-description of the quarterback's Falcons years.`` Mike always worked hard on the football field,'' Brian Finneran said. But as a quarterback, you've got to know everything about that offense, about the line, where the running backs are supposed to be. No question he could have worked harder in the film study room. It's been said before. I think he did the first couple of years, then got a little lax.
